title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing Java file.
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon.
   - A dialog will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename, but ignore the file extension, which is not requested.
6) Click OK.
   - Observe that the Navigator has added the file to the specified location, but no file extension is shown.
EB: After performing the steps mentioned above, the file should be saved with the appropriate file type and the Navigator should display the file with its corresponding file extension.
